channel.title: Cointelegraph.com News
channel.description: Cointelegraph covers fintech, blockchain and Bitcoin bringing you the latest crypto news and analyses on the future of money.

image.title: Cointelegraph.com News
image.description: Cointelegraph covers fintech, blockchain and Bitcoin bringing you the latest crypto news and analyses on the future of money.

item.title: Mining 1 BTC in Lebanon is 783x cheaper than Italy: CoinGecko
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Ciaran Lyons
item.category: Organization for Collection and Sale of State-Owned Property
item.description: According to the report, Europe is home to nine out of the ten least profitable countries for Bitcoin mining, based on household electricity costs.

item.title: SEC seeks appeal over Ripple, crypto prices plunge and EU debuts Bitcoin ETF: Hodler’s Digest, Aug. 13-19
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Editorial Staff
item.description: SEC files motion for appeal on Ripple’s case, Bitcoin and Ether prices plunge and Europe welcomes first spot Bitcoin ETF.

item.title: DeFi protocols Exactly, Harbor hacked in separate attacks
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Ana Paula Pereira
item.description: A fresh round of attacks targeted the DeFi ecosystem on Aug. 18. The Exactly protocol was exploited for nearly $7.3 million, while the Harbor's team is still estimating the amount stolen.

item.title: Ether Futures ETFs could all get approval at same time: Report
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Ana Paula Pereira
item.description: At least 16 applications for Ether or Bitcoin-Ether futures ETFs are awaiting regulatory approval in the United States.

item.title: China facing deflation may be bad news for Bitcoin
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Marcel Pechman
item.description: Cointelegraph analyst and writer Marcel Pechman breaks down the Federal Reserve balance sheet and explains why China’s deflation can negatively impact Bitcoin.

item.title: The ultimate guide to password management for crypto enthusiasts
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Alice Ivey
item.description: Explore strong password creation, management and advanced protection techniques to secure crypto holdings.

item.title: Elon Musk praises pro-crypto Republican presidential candidate
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Amaka Nwaokocha
item.description: The Tesla and SpaceX CEO said Republican party presidential candidate Vivek Ramaswamy is “very promising.“

item.title: What is OpenAI code interpreter, and how does it work?
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Tayyub Yaqoob
item.description: Discover the OpenAI code interpreter, an AI tool that translates human language into code. Learn about its functions, benefits and drawbacks in this guide.

item.title: Sam Bankman-Fried requests weekday freedom for legal defense work
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Amaka Nwaokocha
item.description: Lawyers for SBF stated that their client faced difficulties thoroughly reviewing the extensive documentation related to the case while confined to the detention center.

item.title: Curve Finance to reimburse users, another DeFi hack, and ConsenSys launches L2: Finance Redefined
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Prashant Jha
item.description: The DeFi ecosystem had another exploit of over $2 million on a stablecoin liquidity pool this past week, just weeks after the Curve Finance exploit.

item.title: Why is the crypto market down today?
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Yashu Gola
item.description: The worst week for the cryptocurrency market since November 2022 is coming to an end as its capitalization attempts to stay above $1 trillion.

item.title: Bitcoin Ordinals NFT trading volume tanks 98% since May — DappRadar
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Brian Quarmby
item.description: Alongside the declining trading volumes, the number of Bitcoin Ordinals transactions dropped by 97% to just 20,571 in mid-August.

item.title: Yuga Labs to wind back from OpenSea over its axing of royalty enforcements
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Brian Quarmby
item.description: Yuga Labs said it would start winding back OpenSea support for “all upgradable contracts and any new collections” following the announcement from the NFT marketplace.

item.title: Crypto Biz: Binance Connect goes dark, Prime Trust is bust and PayPal unveils Crypto Hub
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Ana Paula Pereira
item.description: This week’s Crypto Biz explores the Binance Connect shutdown, BitGo’s funding round, the PayPal Crypto Hub and other news.

item.title: Crypto grants foster innovation amid venture capital exodus
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Ana Paula Pereira
item.description: Alternative funding options, such as grant programs, have grown in popularity as the bear market continues to slash venture capital investments in the crypto industry.

item.title: IBM blockchain and AI expert says ChatGPT poses several ‘key risks’ for enterprise use
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Tristan Greene
item.description: Listing numerous areas of concern, IBM Automation’s Jerry Cuomo lays out the potential pitfalls for businesses using ChatGPT.

item.title: Bitcoin price drops to a two-month low — Did pro traders benefit?
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Marcel Pechman
item.description: A massive amount of traders were liquidated as the BTC price dropped to $25,300, but was it primarily retail traders that were washed out?

item.title: LiFi launches multi-bridge governance solution after Uniswap debate
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Tom Blackstone
item.description: The new bridge aggregator allows cross-chain DAOs to only accept votes confirmed by more than one bridge.

item.title: Here’s what happened in crypto today
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Serge Egon Ostman
item.category: why did the Fed pause rates
item.description: Need to know what happened in crypto today? Here is the latest news on daily trends and events impacting Bitcoin price, blockchain, DeFi, NFTs, Web3 and crypto regulation.

item.title: Price analysis 8/18: BTC, ETH, BNB, XRP, ADA, SOL, DOGE, DOT, MATIC, LTC
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Rakesh Upadhyay
item.description: Bitcoin and most major altcoins are reeling under intense selling, and charts suggest that the market sell-off is not complete.

item.title: New Zealand parliamentary report advises against hasty crypto regulation
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Derek Andersen
item.description: An independent report prepared for a House committee suggests the government foster the development of digital asset technology and regulate it cooperatively.

item.title: Crypto Stories: eToro co-founder Yoni Assia’s life in finance led him to adopt crypto early
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Derek Andersen
item.description: Yoni Assia wanted to make trading accessible to “normal” people, and Vitalik Buterin helped him design the platform.

item.title: Elon Musk says block feature to be ‘deleted’ on Twitter/X
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Tristan Greene
item.description: According to Musk, users will have to rely on the “mute” function instead.

item.title: Binance considers legal action against Checkout​.com as partnership ends
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Ana Paula Pereira
item.description: Binance Connect was shut down on Aug. 16 after Checkout.com discontinued supporting the crypto exchange.

item.title: BTC price nears $26K amid warning Bitcoin sell pressure can ‘double’
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By William Suberg
item.description: BTC price weakness continues into Wall Street trading, and Bitcoin has yet to rival seller capitulation from earlier this year.

item.title: AI is helping expand accessibility for people with disabilities
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Shiraz Jagati
item.description: A holistic approach to empowering lives: how AI redefines the accessibility landscape for people with disabilities.

item.title: Bitget and crypto influencer embroiled in legal saga after Reel Star token listing fiasco
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Ana Paula Pereira
item.description: Evan Luthra says Bitget froze his account in April. The exchange claims it was done on suspicions of market manipulation related to the sale of REELT tokens.

item.title: BNB hacker loses over $53M after getting liquidated in market crash
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Ezra Reguerra
item.description: A crypto wallet linked to the BNB Smart Chain exploit had three of its positions liquidated after BNB’s price dropped below $220.

item.title: Bitcoin, Ether price slump leads to crypto bloodbath with $1B in liquidations
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Prashant Jha
item.description: The liquidation event saw one trader lose $55.9 million, while another saw $10 million worth of hedged positions get liquidated.

item.title: Securitize acquires $40B crypto fund manager Onramp
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Helen Partz
item.description: Digital securities firm Securitize will provide new alternative assets to major cryptocurrency fund managers like WisdomTree and Valkyrie Invest.
